description: Lists the contents and location of every tile output by a Wangscape project.
title: Wangscape tiles schema

items.description: Specifies the contents and location of a tile output by Wangscape.
items.title: Tile schema

___x.description: Specifies the horizontal offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset.
___x.title: Tile x offset schema

___y.description: Specifies the vertical offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset
___y.title: Tile y offset schema

___corners.description: Specifies the IDs of the terrain types at the corners of the tile.
___corners.title: Tile corners schema

___filename.description: Specifies the filename of the tileset containing the tile.
___filename.title: Tile filename schema
